title: my account got hacked, i think
body: so a week ago after a ranked game it logged me out and said another computer logged into my account. thought it was  my roommate because he plays with my account sometimes, but it wasnt him. i figured it was a glitch, so i just logged back in like normal. today however, it was different. i was logged out, but when i went to log back in, the password didnt work. i cant even log into my account on this website. im on my alt account right now.  i tried to get the password from the forgot password thing, but the email didnt send either. hopefully i can get this sorted out. i had almost gotten out of bronze. im pissed. if anyone knows what to do here (other than making a new account) than let me know{{champion:84}} {{item:3146}}

replies.body:
I went to double check what was up with your account, then I realized you didn't give me the name of the account that's having troubles DX!

Hit me back up with that Summoner Name and I can take a look into it for you, or you can go ahead and reach out to our account team in their [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). They'll be able to help secure your account and repair any damages that might have taken place!

P.S. Also keep in mind it's pretty frowned upon to share accounts, as you are opening it up to being compromised.

RenegadeGameZ

(ik its cringy af i made it a while ago, thanks for your help)
